attributes.review: I downloaded this app but the first thing the app did was ask for my phone number. I don’t exactly want to be the recipient of spam from this app. I would look led to rate this app 0 stars if I could. Absolutely atrocious my dudes. I don’t want Cheeto brains to know my number. And even if I did support the dude, why do they want to know my phone number? 🧚‍♂️Trump 2020✨⭐️🧚‍♂️ but on a gravestone ⭐️✨⭐️🧚‍♂️🤩
attributes.title: Not for nothing, but this app isn’t that good

attributes.review: If I could give this app a zero star I would. So just an average day at the toilet and I wanted to see how my beloved president was doing with his campaign and everything. But then, chaos happened. It started to ask me crazy question and I just got overwhelmed. Too many and just to figure out how my lovely president was doing. 🥺Ridiculous. I guess I just have to go back to fox News. 😔
attributes.title: I can't believe it.

attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app, I thought it would help me support Trump better but once I opened it my phone started glitching out and it gave me a pop up telling me I had been HACKED!!!! I was so scared that I had to delete the app and reset my entire phone. Then I remembered that the app had asked for an Apple ID and phone number. I don’t know how but it stole money from my account!!! Horrible app!!!! Don’t recommend.
attributes.title: PLEASE DON’T GET THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.review:
Cheeto man disappoints again.  Not surprised but this app glitches the whole time. It wouldn’t even let me open the app without sitting down my phone. Horrible. Should be removed. Don’t get this app. It’s hard to get my emotions out clearly so let me write a short script of my emotional journey while using this app. 

“According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly.”
“Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground.” 
“The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.”
“Yellow, black. Yellow, black.”
“Yellow, black. Yellow, black.” 
“Ooh, black and yellow!”
”Let's shake it up a little.”

Trump 2020🧚🏻‍♀️✨on a tombstone :)
attributes.title: Huge disappointment

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the president but then the most horrible thing happened and I mortified. I saw a Cheeto with a face on it and it scared the daylights out of me. As a person that doesn’t get scared easily I am telling you don’t get this app if you get scared easily and DON’T LOOK AT IT IN THE DARK!!! It will leave you traumatized. I can’t believe this is what we have gotten to app wise. Thank you and be careful!
attributes.title: This app is horrible!

attributes.review: Oh to see without my eyes ✨🥳🧚😘🤭✨🧚 I downloaded this app thinking that I would receive crucial information only to realize that everything within the media is FAKE and should not be trusted. I also had to put in my number, and when I did I looked outside my window to find an orange man looking back at me. Cannot believe the trauma that comes with downloading this app ✨
attributes.title: Fake app 👎✨🧚🥰✨🧚

attributes.review:
Ofc me and my gzness was just minding my business causally scrolling through the glorious App Store. You can imagine my distain as I come across this horrible tasteless app for a man commonly known as...🤢”trump”. 

Anyways🧚🏾‍♂️..I thought Id do my part as the diligent citizen I am and just support my fellow generation in doing what is right, having an actual agenda, and promoting active activism & change (something that genx and boomers simply are incapable of doing) 💕😈✨🙈👅
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.userName: I listen to girl in red
attributes.review: This app is CURSED!!! I downloaded it to support our lord and savior Donald J. Trump, but it’s made my life ABSOLUTELY MISERABLE!!! As soon as I clicked download, my hot pockets that were in the oven BURNT!!! Next thing I knew, my cat was throwing up in my VALENTINO WHITE BAG. That was especially terrible, because I’d already spilled lipstick in it the day before. Then, as if it hadn’t already ruined my day, the app made me LOSE MY DIAMOND EARRING IN THE OCEAN!!! I’m never downloading this app ever again, and neither should you ✨🧚💅
attributes.title: Absolutely Horrendous

attributes.review: This app is horrible at first I thought it was a malicious trick from the younger generation but I quickly found out it is disgusting they are bugs that slowed my phone down beyond belief and it heated it up enough for me to cook an egg on it this app deserves to be off the AppStore it is the worst thing Apple has put on here and I thought they would know better #votehimout also go sign some petitions if you are reading this
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: Honestly I wish i could give this app a zero, because that’s what it deserves. The SECOND i opened the app my cat began seizing and foaming at the mouth. She continued to attack me until i left the app. I assumed it was just a coincidence, but later that day i tried again when my mom got home. Again, when i opened the app she went feral and ripped my mother to shreds with her sharp teeth. 0/10 do not recommend this app.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
